Class BillboardsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • BillboardsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class BillboardsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The Class BillboardsPanel encapsulates view for Billboard panel where users with permissions Permission.EDIT_ALL_BILLBOARDS and Permission.CREATE_BILLBOARDS are able to view, delete, edit or add Billboard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Shows billboard preview.
        Parameters:

        org.xml.sax.SAXException - the SAX exception

      • preview

        public void preview()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Previews the billboard. First, it creates XML document using the data entered by the user. Once created, it stores the document to temp/billboard.xml file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • editBillboard

        public Billboard editBillboard​(int row)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                               org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Edits the billboard.
        Parameters:
        row - the row where user clicks to select required billboard entry
        Returns:
        the billboard to be edited
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - the parser configuration exception
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - the SAX exception

      • updateTable

        public void updateTable​(java.util.List<Billboard> billboards)
        Updates tables with all billboards. This method is invoked by timer in Controller class every GUI.UPDATE_DELAY.
        Parameters:
        billboards - the billboards list to be iterated
